example.text: Even in the midst of an unprecedented public health and economic emergency, we continue to see calculated wrongdoing by some on Wall Street, and without the consequence of meaningful penalties to serve as an effective deterrent, I worry this disturbing culture of misconduct will persist. The amount of penalties the Securities and Exchange Commission, SEC, can fine an institution or individual is restricted by statute.
